con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def varResponse = messageExchange.responseContent def varObj = new JsonSlurper().parseText(varResponse) def varAccessToken= varObj.data.access_token context.testCase.setPropertyValue("AccessToken",varAccessToken)
assert messageExchange.responseStatusCode==200

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def varResponse = messageExchange.responseContent def varObj = new JsonSlurper().parseText(varResponse) def varUserName= varObj.data.username
assert varUserName.equals('upskills_admin') assert messageExchange.responseStatusCode==200

assert varUserName.equals('upskills_admin') assert messageExchange.responseStatusCode==200

log.info varResponse log.info varObj log.info varUserName

log.info varResponse log.info varObj log.info varUserName
